LanguageData.DowngradePsychicAmplifier.label: extract psychic amplifier
LanguageData.DowngradePsychicAmplifier.description:
Extract a single psychic amplifier module from the brain.

This delicate brain surgery has a high chance of failure. It shouldn't be attempted without high-quality facilities - and only when necessary.

If the psychic amplifier is at level 1, it will be removed completely. Otherwise, it will be downgraded by 1 level. The extracted psychic amplifier can be re-installed later.
